name: Pixy Clicker
description:
Pixy clicker is not usual clicker

You must click on fireflies which randomly spawns on screen.
Then you can upgrade your net.

Currently in game avaliable only 2 languages.
Theres not too much content but I may add more in future.

Well there's not good background music, but you can turn it off.
Regarding the installer, windows defender can say what it's danger to run it, so if you don't trust me then here's ZIP archive for you.
